dialogue.text: Depending on the quality of the fishing rod it might be easier to fish
Some fishing rods are unsuitable in certain hazardous environments
Step 2: Have some bait. Be sure to have the correct bait for the fish you want
Step 3: Cast your bait into the water and wait till a fish appears
Step 4: Be sure to nab the fish when you see it by your bait
Step 5: Here comes the hard part. Control your strength when trying to reel in the fish
Try to match your strength to the fish so it tires out and eventually reel it in
